alert.note: Alert for Baboquivari Mountains including Kitt Peak; Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells; Upper Santa Cruz River and Altar Valleys including Nogales (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 3:13PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Pima and western Santa Cruz Counties through 345 PM MST... At 313 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Arivaca, or 22 miles west of Tubac, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sasabe. This includes Route 286 between mile markers 1 and 19. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Baboquivari Mountains including Kitt Peak; Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells; Upper Santa Cruz River and Altar Valleys including Nogales
